snippet.title: RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection - coming in 2023
snippet.description:
Fasten your seat belts, two of the most respected vertical shoot‘em ups TAITO has ever released are coming to the West for a special HD collection! Get ready to be teleported back into some of the most epic wars of outer and cyberspace with the thrilling RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection - coming in 2023 for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4!

Each game features:
- Breath-taking graphics and vistas in 3D polygons, supported by a striking art style 
- The very best music shooting games have to offer, composed by Taito’s legendary sound team ZUNTATA 
- Outstanding gameplay focusing on the lock-on laser and challenging bosses 

To find out more about this release and pre-order your next shoot'em up adventure, check out https://www.iningames.com/games/raystorm-x-raycrisis-hd-collection/
